title: Promos. Free win?
body: Hey, I just lost my promos to Plat. I went 2wins-3losses. Played a game right after and got back into promos. I was wondering, am I supposed to get a free win or not? I get free wins for my second time promos between divisions but it's been too long a while for me to know how it works when in second time tier promos. Does what I'm asking make sense? lol

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

Promo Helper is limited to **below** Gold I only. Promo Helper will not give you a free win in your promotional series to Platinum or any promotional series above that.

More info on Promo Helper [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6q2).
Ahh thank you. I thought it was a glitch when I didn't get my free win but I hadn't realised it was a promo helper for those below Gold 1 haha thanks
